ygData.subject: Re: classes and races
ygData.msgSnippet: Human Warriors require less experience to advance levels than any other class race combination.  You can t see JACK in the dark and none of your stats are
ygData.messageBody:
Human Warriors require less experience to advance levels than any other
class race combination. You can't see JACK in the dark and none of your stats
are particularly great but then if you grouped with an ogre warrior from first
fight through till you hit level 30 he would probably still be on level 25 or
so. its a BIG deal at higher levels.

schlaban yocksovik wrote:

> From: "schlaban yocksovik" <anonymaste@...>
>
> HI.
>
> I was wondering if anyone know what class is the fastest to advance levels

> I know erudites for example get less xp then other races.

>

>

> increase the game diff alot, you should get more xp, is this how it works?
>
> I know some of you dont want this info...so if anyone knows the answer,
> tag the mail with spoiler hehe
>
> thanx
